Html: Just downloaded and installed this program. After monkeying around for a few minutes, I now have the ti84 skin showing in cutout mode. How can I get it back to window mode in order to access the menus?
To access the menus you can simply right click on the screen
I'd still like to know how to get the emulator back into window mode instead of cutout mode.
I'm guessing you didn't put it in to cutout mode then? Regardless, in the goto the menu and go Calculator->options. Under the skin tab uncheck use cutout mode
Thanks! I knew I had changed it back before but couldn't remember how.
